original_title: Schandmaul: Live In Loreley (20 Wahre Jahre)
overview: On September 4, 2015, the band performed in front of 12,000 spectators on the Loreley open-air stage for the 20th anniversary of the band In Extremo at their festival 20 Wahre Jahre.
title: Schandmaul: Live In Loreley (20 Wahre Jahre)
